Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to licensing self-storage warehouses, and to repeal and replace section 20-475 of such code, relating to definitions applicable to storage warehouse licensing, and to repeal section 20-479 of such code, relating to a requirement that a licensed storage warehouse operator file a bond
